channel.title: Add links between Standard element and Dashboard "Who Uses?" page
channel.description:
I just posted a suggested new feature on Github, thought I'd share here to see if others think it could be useful.
Basically, when looking at an element (or codelist) in the Standard section of the website, it would be good to have a link to the Dashboard (Exploring Data section) to check who is using the element. It's doable manually - go to Exploring Data, click on Elements, scroll dooooowwwwwnnnn to the element you're looking for. It would make life easier if direct links can be provided.
https://github.com/IATI/IATI-Extra-Documentation/issues/414

item.title: Add links between Standard element and Dashboard "Who Uses?" page
item.dc:creator: YohannaLoucheur
item.description:
Bringing this back up, in hope it can be taken into account in the website redesign.

Read full topic
item.source: Add links between Standard element and Dashboard "Who Uses?" page
